languages.text: "Огонь, трагедия, крушение убеждений и иерархий, и мы посреди всего этого... Это все очень романтично, разве нет?" {n}Арбитр фыркает.{/n} "Надо будет добавить это в мою инфопластину".
"Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."
languages.original_text: "Огонь, трагедия, крушение убеждений и иерархий, и мы посреди всего этого... Это все очень романтично, разве нет?" {n}Арбитр фыркает.{/n} "Надо будет добавить это в мою инфопластину".

"Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

languages.text: 「炎、悲劇、信念やハイエラークの崩壊。私たちはそのさなかにいる…とてもロマンチックだと思いませんか？」{n}ソロモーンは鼻で笑った。{/n}「このこともデータスレートに書き留めておかないと」
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: 「炎、悲劇、信念やハイエラークの崩壊。私たちはそのさなかにいる…とてもロマンチックだと思いませんか？」{n}ソロモーンは鼻で笑った。{/n}「このこともデータスレートに書き留めておかないと」

languages.text: "Feuer, Tragik, der Zusammenbruch von Überzeugungen und Hierarchien, und wir sind mittendrin ... Ist das nicht alles sehr romantisch?" {n}Solomorne schnaubt.{/n} "Das muss unbedingt in meinen Datablock."
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: "Feuer, Tragik, der Zusammenbruch von Überzeugungen und Hierarchien, und wir sind mittendrin ... Ist das nicht alles sehr romantisch?" {n}Solomorne schnaubt.{/n} "Das muss unbedingt in meinen Datablock."

languages.text: « Nous voilà cernés par les flammes et la tragédie, témoins impuissants de l'effondrement de nos convictions et structures hiérarchiques... Tout ça n'est-il pas terriblement romantique ? » {n}Solomorne s'esclaffe.{/n} « Une idée de plus à consigner dans ma plaque de données. »
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: « Nous voilà cernés par les flammes et la tragédie, témoins impuissants de l'effondrement de nos convictions et structures hiérarchiques... Tout ça n'est-il pas terriblement romantique ? » {n}Solomorne s'esclaffe.{/n} « Une idée de plus à consigner dans ma plaque de données. »

languages.text: «Las llamas, la tragedia, el desplome literal y figurado de convicciones y jerarquías, y nosotros en medio... Es todo muy romántico, ¿no le parece?». {n}Solomorne resopla.{/n} «Tendré que añadirlo a mi tablilla de datos».
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: «Las llamas, la tragedia, el desplome literal y figurado de convicciones y jerarquías, y nosotros en medio... Es todo muy romántico, ¿no le parece?». {n}Solomorne resopla.{/n} «Tendré que añadirlo a mi tablilla de datos».

languages.text: “大火、悲剧、信念与秩序的崩塌，而我们正身处其中……这实在是太浪漫了，不是吗？”{n}索罗蒙哼了一声。{/n}“我得把这段话加到我的数据板里。”
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: “大火、悲剧、信念与秩序的崩塌，而我们正身处其中……这实在是太浪漫了，不是吗？”{n}索罗蒙哼了一声。{/n}“我得把这段话加到我的数据板里。”

languages.text: "Alevler, trajedi, kanaatin ve hiyerarşilerin çöküşünün tam ortasındayız... Romantik değil mi?" {n}Solomorne gülüyor.{/n} "Databelama bunu kaydederim."
languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."

traits.locale_text: "Alevler, trajedi, kanaatin ve hiyerarşilerin çöküşünün tam ortasındayız... Romantik değil mi?" {n}Solomorne güler.{/n} "Databelama bunu kaydederim."

languages.original_text: "Fire, tragedy, the collapse of convictions and hierarchies, and we're in the middle of it all... It's all very romantic, isn't it?" {n}Solomorne snorts.{/n} "I'll have to add that to my data-slate."
